about: Welcome to Abbey Community Centre, we are a vibrant, inclusive and thriving community centre in Kilburn offering a range of activities, classes and groups. We hope you find what you are looking for on our website, or please give us a call or drop  in to see us! We are open seven days a week, office hours are Monday to Thursday, 9.30 –5pm, Friday 9.30 -4pm.
Henderson  Court  is an Age UK Camden resource centre in Hampstead which offers a wide range of day opportunities for anyone who is 60 or over.
Opening Doors London  is the biggest charity providing information and support services with and for older Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Trans* people in the UK.
TalacreCommunity Sports Centre offers a diverse range sports facilities including; a sports hall, adult football pitches, junior football pitches, trampoliningand a cafe.

North London Cares is a community network of young professionals and old neighbours haning out with one onther on a rapidly changing city. Through our Social clubs and Love Your Neighbour (One-to-One) activities neighbours share a little extra time, laughter, parctical help and human companionship.
